title: Best of Patreon: December 2021
itunes:title: Best of Patreon: December 2021
itunes:author: Cloud10 and iHeartPodcasts
itunes:subtitle: If you aren't subscribed to our Patreon, we wanted to give you a glimpse of what we've got going on. This mega-mix of clips brings you some of our favorite segments from the month of December.  You'll hear: - The worst gifts we've ever received; - Who we would cast as our ghosts of Christmas past, present, and future;  - An update on the Murdaugh Murders case in South Carolina;  - The results of Mother God's autopsy and the fate of the Love Has Won cult; and - A taste of our sweet minisode on the Fruitcake Fraud case out of Corsicana, Texas.   If you like what you heard and want full versions of all this and more, head to patreon.com/sinisterhood for full details on all the benefits to subscribe today!
content:encoded:
If you aren't subscribed to our Patreon, we wanted to give you a glimpse of what we've got going on. This mega-mix of clips brings you some of our favorite segments from the month of December.

 

You'll hear:

- The worst gifts we've ever received;

- Who we would cast as our ghosts of Christmas past, present, and future;

- An update on the Murdaugh Murders case in South Carolina;

- The results of Mother God's autopsy and the fate of the Love Has Won cult; and

- A taste of our sweet minisode on the Fruitcake Fraud case out of Corsicana, Texas.

 

If you like what you heard and want full versions of all this and more, head to patreon.com/sinisterhood for full details on all the benefits to subscribe today! 

Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
